document_data.name: Wall against noise
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wall against noise''''' was a [[spell]] unique to [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Effects: This spell created a wall of air that prevented sound from passing through. The wall blocked any sound-based attacks, such as a [[harpy]]'s cry or a [[banshee]]'s wail.
document_data.Components: This spell required a white feather to cast.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Some ancient tales in Zakhara spoke of great cities ruled by [[marid]]s that used ''walls against noise'' to protect their citadels against auditory-based magical items, such as ''[[drums of panic]]'' and ''[[horn of blasting|horns of blasting]]''.
